EntryName	SUMF2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Inactive C-alpha-formylglycine-generating enzyme 2 (Paralog of formylglycine-generating enzyme) (pFGE) (Sulfatase-modifying factor 2)
GeneName	SUMF2 PSEC0171 UNQ1968/PRO4500
Length	301
Function	Lacks formylglycine generating activity and is unable to convert newly synthesized inactive sulfatases to their active form. Inhibits the activation of sulfatases by SUMF1.
Subcellular Location	Endoplasmic reticulum lumen
